verse:
द्वे अक्षरे ब्रह्मपरे त्वनन्ते विद्याविद्ये निहिते यत्र गूढे।
क्षरं त्वविद्या ह्यमृतं तु विद्या विद्याविद्ये ईशते यस्तु सोऽन्यः॥
meaning: There are 2 types of brahm knowledge and ignorance which are infinite and beyond this 2 their is another concealed/hidden brahm within  knowledge and ignorance. Perishable is Ignorance and immortal/imperishable is knowledge. The one who rules/governs both knowledge and ignorance is different from both.
